ERRORS.CLIENT_ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred on the client side. Please check your connection and try again.
ERRORS.USERNAME_EXISTS: Username already exists. Please choose a different username.
ERRORS.EMAIL_EXISTS: Email already exists. Please use a different email address.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_RESET_REQUIRED: Password reset required. Please check your email for instructions.
ERRORS.NAME_EXISTS: Name already exists. Please choose a different name.
ERRORS.PHONE_EXISTS: Phone number already exists. Please use a different phone number.
ERRORS.EMAIL_USERNAME_NOT_FOUND: Email or username not found. Please check your credentials.
ERRORS.INCORRECT_PASSWORD: Password is incorrect. Please try again.
ERRORS.ID_NUMBER_EXISTS: ID number already exists. Please use a different ID number.
ERRORS.NATIONALITY_NOT_EXISTS: Nationality does not exist. Please select a valid nationality.
ERRORS.INVALID_DATE_RANGE: End date cannot be greater than start date. Please adjust your dates.
ERRORS.COUNTRY_NOT_EXISTS: Country does not exist. Please select a valid country.
ERRORS.MANAGER_NOT_EXISTS: Manager does not exist. Please select a valid manager.
ERRORS.ROLE_NOT_EXISTS: Role does not exist. Please select a valid role.
ERRORS.USER_CANNOT_MANAGE_SELF: User cannot manage themselves. Please select a different manager.
ERRORS.AREA_NOT_EXISTS: Area does not exist. Please select a valid area.
ERRORS.CITY_NOT_EXISTS: City does not exist. Please select a valid city.
ERRORS.ORGANIZATION_NOT_EXISTS: Organization does not exist. Please select a valid organization.
ERRORS.BUILDING_NOT_EXISTS: Building does not exist. Please select a valid building.
ERRORS.FLOOR_NOT_EXISTS: Floor does not exist. Please select a valid floor.
ERRORS.SECTION_NOT_EXISTS: Section does not exist. Please select a valid section.
ERRORS.POINT_NOT_EXISTS: Point does not exist. Please select a valid point.
ERRORS.USERS_NOT_FOUND: Users not found. Please try your search again.
ERRORS.SHIFTS_NOT_FOUND: Shifts not found. Please try your search again.
ERRORS.ORGANIZATIONS_NOT_FOUND: Organizations not found. Please try your search again.
ERRORS.BUILDINGS_NOT_FOUND: Buildings not found. Please try your search again.
ERRORS.FLOORS_NOT_FOUND: Floors not found. Please try your search again.
ERRORS.SECTIONS_NOT_FOUND: Sections not found. Please try your search again.
ERRORS.NOT_ASSIGNED_TO_TASK: Not assigned to this task. Please contact your administrator.
ERRORS.CATEGORY_NOT_EXISTS: Category does not exist. Please select a valid category.
ERRORS.PROVIDER_NOT_EXISTS: Provider does not exist. Please select a valid provider.
ERRORS.MATERIAL_NOT_EXISTS: Material does not exist. Please select a valid material.
ERRORS.CURRENT_READING_REQUIRED: Current reading is required for countable points.
ERRORS.AFTER_READING_REQUIRED: After reading is required for countable points.
ERRORS.CATEGORY_CANNOT_BE_PARENT: Category cannot be its own parent. Please select a different parent category.
ERRORS.TASK_CANNOT_BE_PARENT: Task cannot be its own parent. Please select a different parent task.
ERRORS.INVALID_OTP: Invalid OTP code. Please check and try again.
ERRORS.OTP_EXPIRED: OTP code has expired. Please request a new one.
ERRORS.DEVICE_NOT_EXISTS: Device does not exist. Please select a valid device.
ERRORS.DEVICE_ALREADY_ASSIGNED: Device is already assigned to a point. Please select a different device.
ERRORS.PARENT_TASK_NOT_EXISTS: Parent task does not exist. Please select a valid parent task.
ERRORS.TASK_NOT_EXISTS: Task does not exist. Please select a valid task.
ERRORS.READING_OUT_OF_RANGE: Reading is outside the allowed limit range. Please check your input.
ERRORS.TASK_ALREADY_COMPLETED: Task is already completed and cannot be modified.
ERRORS.SHIFT_NOT_EXISTS: Shift does not exist. Please select a valid shift.
ERRORS.CANNOT_DELETE_ASSIGNED_SHIFT: Cannot delete shift assigned to user work location. Please reassign users first.
ERRORS.USER_NOT_EXISTS: User does not exist. Please select a valid user.
ERRORS.TAG_NOT_EXISTS: Tag does not exist. Please select a valid tag.
ERRORS.LEAVE_NOT_EXISTS: Leave does not exist. Please select a valid leave request.
ERRORS.LEAVE_OVERLAPS: Leave request overlaps with existing leave. Please adjust your dates.
ERRORS.SHIFT_OVERLAPS: Shift overlaps with existing shift. Please adjust your timing.
ERRORS.QUANTITY_EXCEEDS_AVAILABLE: Quantity exceeds available amount. Please reduce the quantity.
ERRORS.ASSIGNMENT_LIMIT_REACHED: Already reached the assignment limit. Cannot assign more.
ERRORS.MIN_MAX_VALUE_NOT_EXISTS: Minimum or maximum value does not exist. Please check your configuration.
ERRORS.KEY_NOT_EXISTS: Key does not exist. Please provide a valid key.
ERRORS.LIMIT_NOT_EXISTS: Limit does not exist. Please check your configuration.
ERRORS.LEAVE_DATE_MUST_BE_FUTURE: Leave start date must be in the future. Please select a future date.
ERRORS.QUESTION_NOT_EXISTS: Question does not exist. Please select a valid question.
ERRORS.CHOICE_NOT_EXISTS: Choice does not exist. Please select a valid choice.
ERRORS.FEEDBACK_DEVICE_ALREADY_ASSIGNED: Feedback device is already assigned to a section. Please select a different device.
ERRORS.FEEDBACK_DEVICE_NOT_EXISTS: Feedback device does not exist. Please select a valid device.
ERRORS.SECTION_USAGE_NOT_EXISTS: Section usage does not exist. Please check your configuration.
ERRORS.ALREADY_ASSIGNED_TO_ENTITY: Already assigned to another entity. Cannot assign again.
ERRORS.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
